name: Takes 2 To Love
description:
Takes 2 To Love is a short puzzle game where your goal is to reunite two separated halves of a heart. Created for Major Jam 2 -- a week-long jam with the theme being LOVE and the limitation being that all textures used had to fit on one 128x128 image.

You can find the game jam page here: https://itch.io/jam/major-jam-2

The image containing all of the textures can be found here: https://lospec.com/i/zoel

I would LOVE to know what you think of the game in the comments :)

T2TL also includes unique music specially made by RocketClock :)

The controller buttons used in this game are from Hyohnoo's free pack found here: https://hyohnoo.itch.io/keyboard-controller-keys

All of the sounds other than the music are from Kronbits' free pack found here: https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx

The font used, "Pixelated Love", was made by JustKato and can be found here: https://justkato.itch.io/pixelatedlove
